synopsis.text: Can you imagine being the most popular student in school, admired for your exceptional calligraphy skills, yet perceiving all the admiration as bullying? Meet Sei Handa, a high school student with a unique talent for misinterpreting situations. Despite his peers and teachers praising him, Handa is convinced that everyone despises him. As he tries to navigate his high school life, he encounters various eccentric characters who only add to his confusion. From the Handa Force, a fan club dedicated to protecting him from perceived bullies, to other students who challenge his status as the school idol, Handa's life is anything but ordinary. Will he ever realize the truth about his popularity, or will his misconceptions continue to fuel his anxiety? Join Handa on his hilarious and heartwarming journey as he tries to make sense of his world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
